titles: His Majesties gracious letter to the meeting of the Estates of his ancient kingdom of Scotland William R.
author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Scotland. Convention of Estates.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,
notes: Announces intent to form Scottish Parliament.
At end of text: "Given at our court, at Hampton-Court, the seventeenth day of May, one thousand six hundred and eighty nine, and of our reign the first year".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
